PSCT.Base:
2 Level 4 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card; if you have more cards in your Extra Deck than your opponent's, apply these effects in sequence, depending on the difference.
● 1+: This card gains 1000 ATK until the end of your opponent's turn. ● 5+: Neither player can target this card with card effects until the end of your opponent's turn. ● 10+: Banish 1 card your opponent controls. ● 15+: Make your opponent's LP 3000.
You can only use this effect of "Pendransaction" once per turn.
